    • getNumericalBondOrder

      public int getNumericalBondOrder()
      Converts this ChemCompBond's value_order attribute into an int using the conversion: 
              SING -> 1
        DOUB -> 2
        TRIP -> 3
        QUAD -> 4
      Any other values will return -1.

      (Source: http://mmcif.rcsb.org/dictionaries/mmcif_mdb.dic/Items/_chem_comp_bond. value_order.html)

      Returns:
      the numerical value of this ChemCompBond's bond order, or -1 if the value is non-numeric or unknown.
